sources.title: 1997 - Mean Guns - 100 Assassins. 1,000 Weapons. 10,000,000 Dollars. Only One Can Survive.
sources.description:
Vincent Moon (Ice-T) locks 100 people in a prison, who have betrayed "The Syndicate". They are given weapons and 6 hours to kill each other. The 3 remaining share $10,000,000. Who will split $10 million in this brutal last-man-standing gauntlet?

metadata.Plot: A gangster boss (Ice-T) has a list of about 100 people who have screwed up at one point or another. Rather than outright killing them, he decides to have a little fun by putting all of them together in a high security prison, unarmed, and dumping bucketfulls of guns, ammo, and baseball bats on them and letting them kill each other. The final three who survive are given a prize of 10 million dollars. Let chaos reign.
